member.name: T:InDoOut_Display_Core.Functions.IElementFunction

member.name: T:InDoOut_Display_Core.Screens.IScreen
member.summary: Represents a single screen on a display. Screens can be switched between, and contain unique functionality separated from the display as a whole.
